speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Esther Herranz García, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on the situation of disabled women in the European Union ( 2006/2277(INI) ( A6-0075/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Esther Herranz García, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on the situation of disabled women in the European Union ( 2006/2277(INI) ( A6-0075/2007 ).
agenda_item: Situation of disabled women in the European Union (debate)
